item.title: The ChefWaiter Revolution
item.description: The ChefWaiter Revolution Imagine a high-end restaurant serving very exotic foods (difficult to comprehend, let alone eat and transport) for adventurous eaters. There are two sides to the operation, the chefs and the waiting staff. In my analogy: The chefs team represent developers The very exotic food represents the program The waiting team represents operations The customers represent the various servers / devices where running the program The chefs are responsible for creating amazing, out there experiences for the customers.
